wiki.summary: Butter by BTS is an English language dance-pop single released by BTS on the 21st of May 2021. The song charted at #1 on the Billboard Hot 100 for 7 consecutive weeks. Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: Butter by BTS is an English language dance-pop single released by BTS on the 21st of May 2021. The song charted at #1 on the Billboard Hot 100 for 7 consecutive weeks. Butter Remixes EP Album: Butter (Hotter, Sweeter, Cooler) Butter (Hotter Remix) Last.fm Butter (Sweeter Remix) Last.fm Butter (Cooler Remix) Last.fm In its first day, the music video set a new all time 24 hour record of 108.2M views on YouTube, surpassing their own 101.1M view record for Dynamite. It also recorded the biggest music video premiere on the platform, with over 3.9 M peak concurrents. On Spotify, it scored the biggest (both in chart and counter) debut and biggest counter single day streams with 20.9M global streams (the largest single day streams in the platform's history). BTS (방탄소년단) Last.FM Page - Korean Name: (https://www.last.fm/music/방탄소년단) BTS (방탄소년단) Last.FM Page - English Name: (https://www.last.fm/music/BTS) BTS (방탄소년단) 'Butter' Official MV HYBE Labels Channel (Youtube) Read more on Last.fm.
